projects.title: Classroom Management
projects.description: Website designed in branding of Software Engineering department to create a cohesive user interface. Features course forum, assignments, comments, grading accessible to both students and teachers.

projects.title: Fuzzy Typers
projects.description: Cute Indie Typing Game with my own designed assets to improve typing skills. Object-Oriented and done with C++ and Raylib.

projects.title: Lazada & Shopee Search
projects.description: Search any product from Shopee and Lazada in one app, sorted and displayed. Browser automated with Selenium and Information Scraping with Bs4.

projects.title: Password Security Check
projects.description: Determine passwords strength through researched algorithms including common weaknesses such as guessable patterns, including sequential or repetitive characters, common names or phrases, and dictionary words. Written in Java.
